mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that images are properly scaled and the text remains readable on smaller screens without excessive zooming.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and leverage browser caching to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve metadata, including title tags, descriptions, and header tags, to enhance search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Consider improving navigation and simplifying the layout to make it more user-friendly and intuitive.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing unnecessary steps and making the calendar more interactive.
tips: Add contact information such as phone numbers and emails for better customer support.
Ensure that the website is fully responsive across all devices and browsers.
